alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:09AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1108 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chesterfield, or 8 miles west of Cheraw, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Pageland, Chesterfield, Cheraw State Park, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Northeastern Technical College, Ruby, Mount Croghan, McFarlan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery and Chesterfield Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
